thread.title: Trump Briefed About North Korea Missile Test
thread.title_full: Trump Briefed About North Korea Missile Test

title: Trump Briefed About North Korea Missile Test
text:
Trump Briefed About North Korea Missile Test © REUTERS/ Joshua Roberts Donald Trump has been informed about the newest missile launch by North Korea. © AFP 2016/ Yoshikazu TSUNO Japanese Government Protests North Korea’s Ballistic Missile Launch WASHINGTON (Sputnik) — US President Donald Trump has been informed about the newest missile launch by North Korea and is monitoring the situation, a White House official said Sunday. "We are aware of the missile launch by North Korea. The President has been briefed and we are continuing to closely monitor the situation," the official told journalists in Washington. 
An unidentified ballistic missile blasted off early Sunday from North Korea's western province of North Pyongan and flew some 300 miles before plunging into the Sea of Japan. ...
